GSD.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
power: supply: fix residue sysfs file in error handle route of __power_supply_register()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 1d6d90994a8d32e44b89b5e62a78d9fd50686772, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit 80c6463e2fa3377febfc98a6672d92d07f3c26c1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: power: supply: fix residue sysfs file in error handle route of __power_supply_register()
